channel.title: My Toast club
channel.description: Recent content on My Toast club

item.title: Club
item.description: A club's evening A Toastmasters meeting has 4 parts: Improvisation: We start each evening with table topics. Table TopicsÂ® is a long-standing Toastmasters tradition intended to help members develop their ability to organize their thoughts quickly and respond to an impromptu question or topic. Prepared Speech: Then we move forward with the speeches prepared by our memebers. Preparing for a speech is one of the best ways to ensure you give an effective presentation.

item.title: Come as guest
item.description: You can attend free of charge the toastmasters meetings as a guest.

item.title: Improvisation
item.description: “What do you think about? “ Answer such question with confidence and method!

item.title: Leadership
item.description: Master of ceremony, Club’s president… Take role and develop your leadership skills!

item.title: Present. Convince. Inspire.
item.description: My toast offers a place to develop your public speaking skills. Our Club uses the toastmasters method Toastmasters International, with more than 350 000 members. Toastmasters International helped millions of people to be confident in front of an audience.

item.title: Speech
item.description: On stage, time to shine ! Learn the technics to inspire your public
